## PHYSICS

<|ref|>sub_title<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 390, 388, 407]]<|/det|>
## READ THESE INSTRUCTIONS FIRST  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 416, 715, 432]]<|/det|>
Write your centre number, candidate number and name on all the work you hand in.  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 432, 320, 446]]<|/det|>
Write in dark blue or black pen.  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 446, 502, 461]]<|/det|>
You may use an HB pencil for any diagrams or graphs.  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 460, 504, 475]]<|/det|>
Do not use staples, paper clips, glue or correction fluid.  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 475, 380, 490]]<|/det|>
DO NOT WRITE IN ANY BARCODES.  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 501, 255, 515]]<|/det|>
Answer all questions.  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 515, 361, 530]]<|/det|>
Electronic calculators may be used.  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 530, 767, 546]]<|/det|>
You may lose marks if you do not show your working or if you do not use appropriate units.  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 555, 604, 570]]<|/det|>
At the end of the examination, fasten all your work securely together.  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 570, 759, 585]]<|/det|>
The number of marks is given in brackets [ ] at the end of each question or part question.

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[116, 72, 821, 90]]<|/det|>
A student wants to investigate the effect of air resistance on the swing of a pendulum.

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[116, 103, 918, 136]]<|/det|>
Plan an experiment which will enable him to investigate how air resistance changes the way in which a pendulum swings.

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[116, 150, 398, 167]]<|/det|>
The apparatus available includes:

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[154, 181, 920, 214]]<|/det|>
a light wooden rod, approximately \(80 \text{cm}\) long with a hole at one end, through which a nail will fit

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[154, 212, 751, 229]]<|/det|>
a piece of modelling clay to act as a pendulum bob, as shown in Fig. 4.1

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[154, 227, 855, 244]]<|/det|>
a sheet of thick card which will provide the air resistance when the pendulum swings.

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[116, 258, 324, 275]]<|/det|>
In your plan, you should:

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[116, 289, 127, 306]]<|/det|>
